EmailTemplate.name: Follow up - Gartner
EmailTemplate.subject: Gartner follow up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "Sir or Madam")},
Thanks for taking the time to read trough the newsletter we put together with Gartner! If you have any question or want to learn more about Tricentis Tosca, I would be happy to schedule a call. We could also talk about your challenges and determine whether or not I might be able to offer some help.
Are you available this week for a call?
Thanks and I look forward to hearing from you!
Best regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
Tricentis o - {!User.Phone}, m - {!User.MobilePhone} e - {!User.Email}
Tricentis GmbH Company Headquarters: Saturn Tower, Leonard-Bernstein-Stra√üe 10, 1220 Vienna FN 213896d Handelsgericht Wien
Tricentis US Headquarters, 5150 El Camino Real, Suite D14, Los Altos, CA 94022
